post.body: That program looks amazing! It would be so much fun. Do it. Do it. Do it.
hehehe.
Totally reminds me of the U-Tube subtitled Hitler Videos. They all use the same footage. Here's 1: http://snurl.com/9fvk3
I hope a Sunday Matinee is good 4 U next week. I work Saturday. Maybe we could do brunch and the movie. Happy B-Day again.
http://drawn.ca/.
I tried to call 2 wish you Happy Birthday but your mailbox is full... so 1 more time, "HAPPY BIRTHDAY!! I â™¥ You Kid!!"
HAPPY BIRTHDAY SIVAN!!!!!!!
Nope. Can't say that I have... but I'm not all that into folk music.
OMG, in like 45 minute it's your birthday (I feel like the New Year's Eve Ball right now).
Ha Ha Ha. That's hilarious. He has like 2 lines. Thanks for sharing that.
Hey, thanks a lot. I'll check it out.
BTW, what Season and Episode was he on? ---> I've got Netflix.
I'm off to ZZZZzzzzz land. Goodnight.
BBC Article on the new actor to take David Tennant's place as the new Doctor in 'Doctor Who' http://snurl.com/9frk8.
Back from a B-day dinner 4 my Mom. Tomorrow's another B-Day dinner 4 her w/more family. What can I say? She's awesome http://snurl.com/9fp8r
Oh Crap! Phishing Scam Spreading on Twitter! Read this now! http://tinyurl.com/9rmfy6 (Thanks @chrispirillo and @TheMacMommy!).
Crappy TV marathons of Desperate House Wives and Big Bang Theory while completing the cleaning out and organizing drawers and paperwork.
Some Pics I took when I was 13, on location for Stephen King's 'Children Of The Corn: http://snurl.com/9f7c9
Just watched my Dad (JC Curtiss) on the TV show 'Adam 12' Season 4 Episode 1 'Extortion' on Netflix 'Watch Instantly'. (Thanks @csallquist)
That's it. I'm falling asleep at the keyboard. I'm off to ZZZZzzzzz. Goodnight all.
